name: Sword Flight
description:
Made in 2 weeks for GDKO Round 1 with the task "Make a single level in a unique location" so I made the location like a ninja dojo (at least tried to) and uhh its totally one super wide level

Includes:
  • 1 super wide level with 12 sub-levels (totally following the task)
  • A squishy square named Bob
  • A sword
  • A squishy square named Bob with a sword

Heres the current record (by Omnicron): 

Share your times in the comments

Controls
  • Move: Arrows/WASD
  • Jump: Z/J
  • Attack: X/K
  • Aim: Arrows/WASD
  • Restart Sub-Level: R
  • Restart Game: Delete/Esc

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/8tAvpcSz7x
